translations.translation: That the second creation is incumbent on Him;
and that it is for Him to grant the second life,
and on Him depends the life hereafter.
And that only upon Him is the next revival?
And that upon Him is another bringing forth (Resurrection).
And that on Him is the bringing forth a second time;
and that upon Him rests the second growth,
And that He hath ordained the second bringing forth;
and that He will bring about the Second Creation;
And that upon Him is another bringing forth.
that with Him lies the second genesis,
That He hath promised a Second Creation (Raising of the Dead);
And that upon Him (Allah) is another bringing forth (Resurrection);
and that upon Him is the second creation
And that upon Him is the next existence.
And that [incumbent] upon Him is the next creation
[53:47] and that with Him rests the second genesis (read al-nashā’ata, or al-nash’ata), the other creation, for the Resurrection, after the first creation,
(And that He hath ordained the second bringing forth) the other creation after the resurrection;

commentaries.author: زيد بن علي
commentaries.text: وقوله تعالى: { وَأَنَّ عَلَيْهِ ٱلنَّشْأَةَ ٱلأُخْرَىٰ } معناه إحياءُ الأَمواتِ

commentaries.author: الجيلاني
commentaries.text: { وَأَنَّ عَلَيْهِ ٱلنَّشْأَةَ ٱلأُخْرَىٰ } [النجم: 47] أي: عليه سبحانه إعادة الأموات أحياء في النشأة الأخرى، كما أن عليه الإبداء في النشأة الأولى
